005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
013
014import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
015import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
016
017@SuppressWarnings({
018    "PMD.DataClass",
019    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
020})
021@MetaschemaAssembly(
022    formalName = "Flag Used as the Field Value's JSON Property Name",
023    name = "json-value-key-flag",
024    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
025public class JsonValueKeyFlag implements IBoundObject {
026  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
027
028  @BoundFlag(
029      formalName = "Flag Reference",
030      name = "flag-ref",
031      required = true,
032      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
033  private String _flagRef;
034
035  public JsonValueKeyFlag() {
036    this(null);
037  }
038
039  public JsonValueKeyFlag(IMetaschemaData data) {
040    this.__metaschemaData = data;
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
045    return __metaschemaData;
046  }
047
048  public String getFlagRef() {
049    return _flagRef;
050  }
051
052  public void setFlagRef(String value) {
053    _flagRef = value;
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public String toString() {
058    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
059  }
060}
